lightsensitivity: ISO 1600, ISO 200, ISO 320, ISO 400, ISO 600, ISO 800
additionalfeatures: AE/FE Lock, AF Lock, Auto Power Save, Brightness Control, DPOF Support, Date/Time Stamp, Depth-Of-Field Preview Button, Direct Print, Histogram Display, PictBridge Support
connectortypes: 1 x USB, 1 x composite video output
lenssystemfeatures: Silent Wave Motor (SWM), Aspherical Lens, Internal Focusing System, ED Glass
operatingsystemsupported: MS Windows 2000, MS Windows ME, MS Windows XP
flashmodes: Auto Mode, Fill-in Mode, OFF mode, Rear Curtain Sync, Red-eye Reduction, Slow Synchro
shootingprograms: Close-up, Landscape, Night landscape, Night portrait, Portrait mode, Sports mode
